mutants.code:
def convert_scientific_notation_to_decimal(input_data):
    n = int(input_data[0])
    arr = []
    i = 2
    while i < len(input_data):
        arr.append(float(input_data[i]))
        i += 1
        arr.append(int(input_data[i]))
        i += 1
    ans = []
    i = 0
    while i < len(arr):
        base = arr[i]
        i += 1
        exponent = arr[i]
        i += 1
        decimal_value = base * 10 ** exponent
        ans.append('{:.2f}'.format(decimal_value))
    return ans

        arr.append(int(input_data[i]))
        i += 1
    ans = []
    i = 0
    while i < len(arr):
        base = arr[i]
        i += 1
        exponent = arr[i]
        i += 1
        decimal_value = base * 0 ** exponent
        ans.append('{:.2f}'.format(decimal_value))
    return ans
